pizzaProgram.modules
Class GUIModule

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.modules.Module
      pizzaProgram.modules.GUIModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminGUI, CookGUI, DeliverGUI, OrderGUI
public abstract class GUIModule
extends Module

The base class for a GUI module. As GUI views can be hidden or shown it adds those methods to the Module class.

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011
